ygData.subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Where to be lvl 31
ygData.msgSnippet: 1. Frontier Mountains off of Lake of Ill Omen 2. A zone group in Kedge Keep 3. Mistmore in the maid/butler area (not a great faction option for you though) 4.
ygData.messageBody:
1. Frontier Mountains off of Lake of Ill Omen
2. A zone group in Kedge Keep
3. Mistmore in the maid/butler area (not a great faction option for you though)
4. Sol A in the bar area

regards

Flair Shieldrender
52 Champion Fennin Ro

Belzarak Bladedancer wrote:
My personal suggestion is Sol A.  I went from level 29 to level 34 in about 14 hours with my warrior there.  The group consisted of myself, an equal level bard (my wife's char), and a level 24 druid for spot healing.  With a good group and fast pulling, Sol A is one of the best exp dungeons I've seen.

Belzarak

At 09:01 PM 1/11/2001 +0000, you wrote:
Where would you recommend getting the best exp, not so much loot (loot
nice to), but best exp. I am tired of CT and in OT now, any
suggestions? Lvl 31 DE warrior.



For the Honor and Glory of the Warlord, Rallos Zek!





BelZarak  Bladedancer  <Emef' Aitch>
Half-Elven Warrior  

The Rathe
eGroups Sponsor

For the Honor and Glory of the Warlord, Rallos Zek!
